parameters.toolDescription:
List bundles

Parameters:
- Query parameters:
  ‚Ä¢ limit (optional) - Limit results to specified number of bundles. Default is 10. Max 100.
  ‚Ä¢ embed (optional) - List of link relations to embed in the result collection. Zero or more of: items, tracks, metadata, insights. List is space or comma separated single string or an array of strings
  ‚Ä¢ iterator (optional) - Optional opaque value, automatically provided in next/prev links, or literal "first", "last"

parameters.toolDescription:
Generate Group Report beta

Parameters:
- Query parameters:
  ‚Ä¢ interval (required) - Duration of report periods. Default is month.
  ‚Ä¢ score_field (required) - A bundle/metadata field to use as a score. Ex. insights.spoken_words.listener_score.
  ‚Ä¢ group_field (required) - A metadata field by which to group scores, typically a user or team id field.
  ‚Ä¢ filter (optional) - Filter expression, typically programmatically generated based on input controls and data segregation rules etc. Up to 500 characters.
  ‚Ä¢ language (optional) - Language to search in, specified with an RFC5646 code. Default is "en"

Generate Trends Report beta

Parameters:
- Query parameters:
  ‚Ä¢ interval (required) - Duration of report periods. Default is month.
  ‚Ä¢ content (optional) - Content reported in each period. Zero or more of tracks, spoken_words, spoken_keywords. List is space or comma separated single string or an array of strings.
  ‚Ä¢ filter (optional) - Filter expression, typically programmatically generated based on input controls and data segregation rules etc. Up to 500 characters.
  ‚Ä¢ language (optional) - Language to search in, specified with an RFC5646 code. Default is "en"

parameters.toolDescription:
Search bundles

Parameters:
- Query parameters:
  ‚Ä¢ query (optional) - Search terms, typically as typed into a search field. Up to 120 characters.
  ‚Ä¢ query_fields (optional) - List of insights, metadata, and bundle fields to search with the query. Use insights.spoken_words for searching audio, metadata.* for all metadata fields, bundle.* for all bundle fields, * for audio and all fields. Default is insights.spoken_words and metadata.*. List is space or comma separated single string or an array of strings. If single string, up to 1024 characters.
  ‚Ä¢ filter (optional) - Filter expression, typically programmatically generated based on input controls and data segregation rules etc. Up to 500 characters.
  ‚Ä¢ language (optional) - Language to search in, specified with an RFC5646 code. Default is "en"
  ‚Ä¢ limit (optional) - Limit results to specified number of bundles. Default is 10. Max 100.
  ‚Ä¢ embed (optional) - List of link relations to embed in the result collection. Zero or more of: items, tracks, metadata, insights. List is space or comma separated single string or an array of strings
  ‚Ä¢ iterator (optional) - Opaque value, automatically provided in next/prev links
